text: Maaŋ muuŋgiap, nde na phorgap guigira Zisas khothɨgi gumgi, nde wari won ndavi havhargip, mbaram kɨv, simtɨgi ndiv, Guma Bakɨme rargɨ kɨrim, ana taagi zirɨrga. Nza khueŋ kaŋgi, guma mɨn ki, ana won mɨn mban vhuuŋ tɨrgen rarga ki. Ana won ndava havhargiap, ana mbarara kav, mbok gum ran rargim, mani fharav won ŋaara muuŋgim, ana zumgum mba ndi.
